product_name: Topeak Dyna Wedge Micro Saddle Pack
long_description: An aerodynamic saddle pack that weighs only 66g, the Topeak Dyna Wedge Micro Saddle Pack offers enough room for an extra tube and small repair items. Molded construction is light, water repellent and aerodynamic. Fits seatpost diameter of 25.4mm - 31.8mm, and offers compatability with virtually all types of saddle rails. Aerodynamic design fits neatly between seat rails, and rubber seatpost strap eliminates rubbing inside thigh. Topeak Dyna Wedge Micro Saddle Pack mounts to saddle rails and seatpost with rip-and-stick straps.
short_description: An aerodynamic saddle pack that weighs only 66g, the Topeak Dyna Wedge Micro Saddle Pack offers enough room for an extra tube and small repair items.
